name: toolbar-button-to-open-url-in-private-browsing-window-addon
title: Open preset URL in Private Browsing window
description:
Display a toolbar button to open a preset URL in a new Private Browsing window.

Icon by Aha-Soft, published under the CC Attribution 3.0 United States License.

16px version downscaled by aviav.

More info about Aha-Soft and the License under http://files.softicons.com/download/toolbar-icons/free-grey-button-icons-by-aha-soft/readme.txt .
author: aviav

preferences.name: privateHome
preferences.title: URL
preferences.description: To be opened in Private Browsing window
Makes Ctrl+Shift+P open the URL configured in this add-on.
